fung_lam.name: Fung Lam
fung_lam.title: Developer Advocate
fung_lam.bio: Fung is an Android Developer. One of his recent app just reach 100,000+ installs and 4.7 stars under 400+ reviews.

emma_wong.bio:
Emma is an experienced Android developer, have delivered over 20 mobile/web application projects, include awarded mobile apps with >1 Million users. She is the GDG HK organizer, and Womem Techmakers(WTM) Ambassador.
Google's Women Techmakers program provides visibility, community, and resources for women in technology. https://www.womentechmakers.com
emma_wong.shortBio: Emma Wong is the WTM Hong Kong Lead...
emma_wong.name: Emma Wong
emma_wong.title: GDGHK Organizer, WTM Ambassador

kinni_mew.bio:
Kinni is the founder of Mindlayer, a Natural Language Processing startup solving the real world NLP tasks for the Chinese Languages. He leads the team to build NLP applications such as Text Classification, Sentiment Analysis, Dialogue System, Machine Comprehension, etc.
He is also one of the organizers of the GDG Hong Kong. He promotes machine learning to the community by giving talks, workshops and consultations.
kinni_mew.shortBio: Kinni is the founder of Mindlayer, a Natural Language Processing startup...
kinni_mew.name: Kinni Mew
kinni_mew.title: NLP Engineer

homing.bio: Homing helps unleash the potential of maps in different businesses and applications. Google recognises his contribution in Google Maps and awarded him as "Google Developer Experts in Maps APIs". In his spare time, he serves as an organiser for the Google Developers Group to promote wider and more extensive use of Google's technology.
homing.shortBio: Homing helps unleash the potential of maps in different businesses and applications...
homing.name: Homing Tam
homing.title: Product Manager

herbert_man.name: Herbert Man
herbert_man.title: Organizer
herbert_man.bio: 一名80後IT人及大學導師。主攻PWA/AMP及Android開發，現為GDG Hong Kong Organizer之一。自小與自然為伍，樂活在大自然中。對香港歷史有濃厚興趣，並喜愛找尋本土歷史。在港積極投入推動體驗教育、戶外學習，並將IT技術融入其中。

guan_wang.name: Guan Wang
guan_wang.title: Data Scientist
guan_wang.bio:
Guan works as Data Scientist at Swiss Re. His job involves using machine learning and data mining techniques for automation and augmented intelligence while respecting data privacy and model interpretation. He is also a Google Developer Expert in Machine Learning. Previously Guan was working on natural language processing research at Lenovo and machine vision projects at ASTRI. During his study in HKUST and Peking University Guan also did some academic work with publications on genetic algorithms and complex network analysis.
Guan writes in Chinese, English, Python and Powerpoint, socializes on Github, and sometimes speaks a bit.

henry_chan.shortBio: Henry Chan is the Technical Lead from Mindlayer...
henry_chan.name: Henry Chan
henry_chan.title: Technical Lead
henry_chan.bio: Henry Chan is the Technical Lead from Mindlayer, one of the leading Applied Machine Learning company in Hong Kong. He adopts technologies and methodologies which brings productive and cost-effective practices to the SDLC. As a role of full stack developer he has been building top earning tool apps in some countries, developing chatbot, robotics solution for enterprise and building his disease classifier for medic-tech to taught himself ML & AI.

cyrus_wong.shortBio: Cyrus Wong is Data Scientist of Cloud Innovation Centre...
cyrus_wong.name: Cyrus Wong
cyrus_wong.title: Data Scientist
cyrus_wong.bio:
Cyrus Wong is Data Scientist of Cloud Innovation Centre at the IT Department of the Hong Kong Institute of Vocational Education (Lee Wai Lee). He has achieved all 11 AWS Certifications and actively promotes the use of AWS in different media and events. His projects received four Hong Kong ICT Awards in 2014, 2015, and 2016, and all winning projects are running solely on AWS with Data Science and Machine Learning. One of the winning projects is “AWS Cloud Lab Environment,” an open-sourced project for educators to create tailor-made lab environments on AWS.
Cyrus also helps to deliver the full-time course “Higher Diploma in Cloud and Data Centre Administration,” which is the first tertiary course in Asia dedicated to provide Cloud Technology training. The course is committed to providing AWS Academy training to Hong Kong students and Cyrus is an AWS Academy Accredited Trainer. He incorporates AI/ML into his daily curriculum and often writes about projects. Examples include: Analyze Emotion in Video Frame Samples Using Amazon Rekognition on AWS, Build an Amazon Lex Chatbot with Microsoft Excel, and Using AWS AI and Amazon Sumerian in IT Education.
He shares his AWS and cloud related knowledge and experience on his LinkedIn Blog, he is an active member in the AWS Hong Kong User Group, and he created a YouTube channel “AWS Talks in Cantonese (廣東話重講 AWS),” which is his presentation on important AWS topics for Hong Kong, China, and Taiwan AWS users who are not familiar with English. One of the most popular blog posts by Cyrus is “How to get all AWS Certifications in Asia?”

jane_freider.shortBio: Jane has almost 20 years of working experience as a software developer, a solution architect and an engineering leader...
jane_freider.name: Evguenia (Jane) Freider
jane_freider.title: Head of Engineering, Candidate domain
jane_freider.bio: Jane has almost 20 years of working experience as a software developer, a solution architect and an engineering leader. Jane holds Masters in Computer Science and 2 patents in software delivery algorithms. Jane currently leads multiple teams at Seek Asia to deliver the best user experience for JobsDB and JobStreet job searching websites. Jane is very passionate security, best engineering practices, and software architectures as well as people around her. She now uses her knowledge and past experience to lead and grow engineers in Hong Kong and Malaysia.

julia_tsoi.shortBio: Julia is a design thinker, change agent and dreamer all-in-one...
julia_tsoi.name: Julia Tsoi
julia_tsoi.title: Digital Strategist
julia_tsoi.bio:
Julia is a design thinker, change agent and dreamer all-in-one.
As a Design Thinking Coach and Digital Consultant, she has dynamic exposure in banking, insurance, airlines, and public sectors. She loves post-its, innovative workshops, and how design thinking could lead to beautiful things that matter to people.
This year she spent 9 months at the Apple Developer Academy in Naples, Italy, working with the other top 400 talents around the globe to build human-centric iOS apps.

julius_uy.shortBio: Julius leads the Mobile Apps and TV engineering teams in Rakuten Viki...
julius_uy.name: Julius Uy
julius_uy.title: Engineering Manager
julius_uy.bio: Julius leads the Mobile Apps and TV engineering teams in Rakuten Viki. His team works on various projects such as Apple TV, Android TV, Roku, Google Play Instant, Google Home, Chromecast, Chrome OS, and Smart Displays. Their works were featured on Google I/O, WWDC, Android Developer Story, Editor’s Choice, Android Excellence, and in several news sites and tech blogs.

george.name: George Leung
george.bio: Backend guy with some experience in statically typed JVM languages (Kotlin, Scala)

ivan_so.shortBio: Ivan So have 15 years of experience on SEO...
ivan_so.name: Ivan So
ivan_so.title: Digital Consultant
ivan_so.bio:
Ivan So have 15 years of experience on SEO, WordPress websites, E-Commerce and so on. He had built more than 50 websites to test the impact of SEO on websites, some performed really well and ended up sold to different companies.
He had also managed more than 350 WordPress and E-Commerce website, and had won countless prize in the IT industry.

harshdeep_vaghela.shortBio: Harsh is a project manager at KaiOS Technologies...
harshdeep_vaghela.name: Harsh
harshdeep_vaghela.title: Project Manager
harshdeep_vaghela.bio:
Harsh is a project manager at KaiOS Technologies, the company behind a fast-growing, global ecosystem of affordable digital products and services. Key to these offerings Is KaiOS, the leading mobile operating system that empowers people around the world and helps close the digital divide.
In this role, Harsh is responsible for growing the application ecosystem and bringing invaluable apps and services to KaiOS users.
Harsh directly works with the app developers, both world’s leading and local content partners, to bring in an expanding library of essential apps with a broadening variety of utilities, which are carefully selected and customized for first-time internet users.
As part of the monetization team, Harsh drives strategic partnerships with industry bodies as well as key and independent developers, to conceptualize and execute joint initiatives to bring more developers on board. He also provides developer-centric tools and resources to educate the developers on app development, user engagement, and monetization.
With a dedication of reaching out directly to the wider developer communities, he initiated the first collaboration with programming schools and conducted workshops with the developer communities in Kenya and Ethiopia.
Harsh is highly motivated and passionate about developing scalable products and deploying them globally.
Before joining KaiOS, Harsh was a lead mobile app developer at Samsung Mobile.
Harsh holds an MBA from the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology and is currently based in Hong Kong. He enjoys hiking and running and is training for his next Hong Kong Marathon in February 2020.

orix_auyeung.shortBio: Hello there! I’m Orix, a full-time developer...
orix_auyeung.name: Orix Au Yeung
orix_auyeung.title: Developer
orix_auyeung.bio: Hello there! I’m Orix, a full-time developer in Master Concept (HK) Limited focusing on designing & making Cloud and/or ML solutions. I spend most of my spare time reading & coding stuff that I’m interested in. Avid fan of Google products and technologies. Google Cloud Certified Professional Data Engineer / Cloud Architect / Cloud Developer. Currently a co-organizer of GDG Hong Kong.

tony_yip.shortBio: Tony Yip is the Frontend Developer...
tony_yip.name: Tony Yip
tony_yip.bio: Tony Yip is the Frontend Developer of Shinetown Telecommunication Limited. He manages frontend website AIRSIM, one of the product of the company. He works with both Vue and React

yeung.shortBio: Yeung is passionate about developing in the area of data science...
yeung.name: Yeung
yeung.title: Big Data Analytics Modelling Analyst (Betting)
yeung.bio: Yeung is passionate about developing in the area of data science, deep learning and artificial intelligence. He enjoys having a sense of accomplishment once successfully solving a tremendous difficulty. He is active in joining Datathon and Hackathon to gain experience in handling real-life data, and to cooperate with various expertizes such as UX/UI designers, businessmen or software developers and extend his social networks. He is a data scientist who keeps learning and curious about a variety of fields such as natural language processing, computer vision, augmented reality and blockchain. Yeung truly believes that the key to success is communication. Not only with people, but also with data!

sunny_tse.shortBio: Sunny is a Freelance Developer and Technical Manager who helps international IT enterprise...
sunny_tse.name: Sunny Tse
sunny_tse.title: Technical Program Manager
sunny_tse.bio:
Sunny is a Freelance Developer and Technical Manager who helps international IT enterprise and local startups build an audience and develop quality products.
Before starting the freelance jobs, Sunny spent around seven years as a Software and Full Stack Developer for IT companies in Hong Kong, Singapore and Australia.
After a successful career in E-Commerce area, Sunny helps different area of clients to develop products and services. Sunny enjoys trying new sports like Practical Shooting, and playing board games as well.
Sunny's available for developing projects, as well as private consultation. My email is sunnyapp1001@gmail.com

elliot.shortBio: I talk with words, demo, and code....
elliot.name: Elliot
elliot.title: Developer Evangelist
elliot.bio:
Elliot connects with developers and promotes good practices inside and outside Oursky. His inspirations come from his constant involvement in development.
Before joining Oursky, Elliot focused on developing reliable payment services for a Hong Kong leading multimedia company - HK01. He contributed to both frontend and backend to ensure payments were conducted in a highly secure, flawless manner. These payment services have been tested and widely adopted in various public events, including HKTDC Hong Kong Book Fair 2018. Prior to that, he was a frontend engineer at Harborx, a licensed mobile-based forex exchange brokerage, where he specialized in iOS and Android development to provide users a secure and seamless user experience.
